      • objectCollides

        public boolean objectCollides(java.lang.Integer otherX,
                              java.lang.Integer otherY,
                              java.lang.Integer otherWidth,
                              java.lang.Integer otherHeight)
        checks if the ball has collided with another object based on the parameters
        Parameters:
        otherX - the x position of the object being checked
        otherY - the y position of the object being checked
        otherWidth - the width of the object being checked
        otherHeight - the height of the object being checked
        Returns:
        true if the ball overlaps with the object given, otherwise return false

      • serve

        sets the current speed of the ball to the original speed of the ball based on what the serving direction is the ball will be sent that direction
